name: DELIR (Florin Pain)
description:
A simple distress call from the morgue turns into something surreal and you end up fighting for your life. You don't know what's real and what's in your head.

Game done as a team of two. with  https://ursa-bitexe.itch.io/

Donations: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/FlorinPain

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/florinpain_official/

Web Site: https://florinpainofficial.weebly.com/
